summary: LOOSE STEERING, WANDERING ON THE ROAD AND DIFFICULTY STAYING IN A STRAIGHT LINE WHEN ON UNEVEN ROADWAYS.  WHEN GOING OVER BUMPS THE VEHICLE PULLS TO ONE SIDE OR THE OTHER AND WHEN YOU TRY TO  CORRECT IT THE STEERING OVER-CORRECTS AND YOU GET INTO A BACK AND FORTH WOBBLE.  AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS.
